Name: Crazy space pirate
About the game: Crazy space pirate - is the story of a space pirate who was put in prison, he was able to get out of prison, but he still has to get out of the destroyed earth. - Nice pixel graphics - Ease of management - Platformer made in the spirit of the old classics - Many different levels and enemies - - Nice soundtrack - Interesting puzzle Will you be able to get out of the destroyed earth?
